long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Accessibility Analyzer Tool is an exceptional free resource for conducting quick accessibility audits of web pages. It scans web pages for potential accessibility issues, providing valuable insights into non-functional code that may cause accessibility problems.

To ensure a comprehensive evaluation of accessibility issues, it should be combined with manual checks and other testing methods as part of an overall accessibility testing process.

Features:
 ☛ Provides a user-friendly experience by allowing users to inspect issues within the Developer toolbar, minimizing the number of interactions required to understand the problem
 ☛ Offers specific recommendations to help address the accessibility issues identified during analysis, making it easier for website owners and developers to make improvements
 ☛ Utilizes the WCAG Guidelines 2.2 as a reference to analyze webpages for accessibility issues, both online and offline
☛ Offers comprehensive accessibility guidelines that provide detailed information for understanding and addressing accessibility issues
☛ Enables users to inspect issues in the Developer toolbar, facilitating easier understanding and fewer user interactions
☛ Download the audit report in .xls format with custom developer comments
